name: StarFlare Free
description:
In the year 2313, the space patrol fleet is suddenly out of control, and unmanned fighters begin to attack and destroy anything that approaches them. Now, they’re turning the next target to their mother planet – Earth.

The only way to stop this coming disaster is to destroy the main center of the fleet. Can you, who is piloting a “STAR FLARE” fighter equipped with various weapons, be the solution for this crisis?



-= FREE Version Notes=-

● Stage 1 only



Features

* A shooting game with retro style graphic and sound effect.
* Four different weapons: Rapid guns,Splash shoot, Blast missile, Laser
* Stage bosses with different attack modes and form.
* Game Center supported; compete score with players around the world.
